title: Leaverbuster..
body: I'm all for the idea of it, but 20 minutes is a little to much? Just saying, maybe 10 minutes? TBH, 20 minutes is overkill.

replies.body: wow how come we still got report when we are brb and  still got report afk...........................

> [{quoted}](name=NEON Lucky,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=ejHZrAiu,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-02-25T08:27:11.187+0000)
>
> I'm all for the idea of it, but 20 minutes is a little to much? Just saying, maybe 10 minutes? TBH, 20 minutes is overkill.

I get 13's and I think that is fair.  Only 2 in 100 days.
